messages.title: Labour's record investment
messages.content: Labour's record investment includes funding for schools, hospital, and a community centre, as well as a new dental practice and modern train station.

messages.title: Health and leisure
messages.content: Labour will continue large investments in healthcare and work on eliminating hidden charges for leisure facilities, focusing on healthier communities.

messages.title: Securing the economic recovery
messages.content: Dave Anderson insists on securing the economic recovery by protecting vital services and jobs in health, education, police, and caring services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Eliminate hidden charges and ensure investment in healthy living.
Protect vital services and jobs in health, education, police, and caring services to secure economic recovery.
Work to deliver justice for asbestos victims, ensuring they and their families are properly compensated.

mentions.candidate: Dave Anderson is proud to support his local community and believes in fighting for every vote and every family in the Labour stronghold.

issues.economy: Dave Anderson will work towards sustaining the economic recovery through safeguarding services and job opportunities.
issues.education: Dave Anderson backs Labour's investment in schooling, aiming to raise education standards.
issues.health: Dave Anderson emphasizes the importance of ongoing large investments in healthcare and encourages healthier communities.

housing.content: Dave Anderson has supported delivering affordable homes and tackling homelessness.

leaflet.personalStatement: Dave Anderson talks about his pride in serving the local community and his commitment to battle for every vote and every family.

images.caption: Dave Anderson with various groups of people, including children, older people, and workers.
